name: Inell and Eddie DUMAS, Appellees, v. BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Dumas v. Board of Finance & Revenue

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Inell and Eddie DUMAS, Appellees, v. BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert P. Kane, Atty. Gen., Donald J. Murphy, Linda S. Lichtman, Deputy Attys. Gen., Linda M. Gunn, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellant..
Community Legal Services, Jonathan M. Stein, Philadelphia, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
385 A.2d 976
Inell and Eddie DUMAS, Appellees, v. BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 11, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
Robert P. Kane, Atty. Gen., Donald J. Murphy, Linda S. Lichtman, Deputy Attys. Gen., Linda M. Gunn, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellant..
Community Legal Services, Jonathan M. Stein, Philadelphia, for appellees.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
